languages.text: Кто-то пытался смазывать шестерню кровью, но та лишь застыла сухой коркой, навеки сковав механизм.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.
languages.original_text: Кто-то пытался смазывать шестерню кровью, но та лишь застыла сухой коркой, навеки сковав механизм.

traits.locale_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that rendered the mechanism motionless forever.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that rendered the mechanism motionless forever.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.
Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

languages.text: 歯車の歯に血をぬって潤滑を改善しようとしたのだろう。しかし乾いた血が、その機構を永久に留めてしまった。
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: 歯車の歯に血をぬって潤滑を改善しようとしたのだろう。しかし乾いた血が、その機構を永久に留めてしまった。

languages.text: 有人试图用血液润滑齿轮，结果血液凝固之后结成了硬壳，将机器彻底卡住了。
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: 有人试图用血液润滑齿轮，结果血液凝固之后结成了硬壳，将机器彻底卡住了。

languages.text: Quelqu'un semble avoir essayé de lubrifier les rouages avec du sang, qui a coagulé jusqu'à former une épaisse croûte, paralysant à jamais le mécanisme.
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un semble avoir essayé de lubrifier les rouages avec du sang, qui a coagulé jusqu'à former une épaisse croûte, paralysant à jamais le mécanisme.

languages.text: Alguien intentó lubricar el engranaje con sangre, pero solo consiguió formar una costra seca que bloqueará el mecanismo para siempre.
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: Alguien intentó lubricar el engranaje con sangre, pero solo consiguió formar una costra seca que bloqueará el mecanismo para siempre.

languages.text: Jemand hat versucht, den Cog mit Blut zu schmieren, es hat jedoch nur eine trockene Kruste gebildet, durch die der Mechanismus für immer eingefroren ist.
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat versucht, den Cog mit Blut zu schmieren, es hat jedoch nur eine trockene Kruste gebildet, durch die der Mechanismus für immer eingefroren ist.

languages.text: Birileri dişliyi kanla yağlamaya çalışmış, o da kuruyup paslanarak mekanizmayı kalıcı olarak işlevsiz bırakmış.
languages.original_text: Someone tried to lubricate the cog with blood, only for it to form a dry crust that bound the mechanism forever.

traits.locale_text: Birileri dişliyi kanla yağlamaya çalışmış ve o da kuruyup paslanarak, mekanizmayı kalıcı olarak işlevsiz hâle getirmiş.
